forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with periods of light rain and snow after midnight. Low near -5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early followed by a mixture of light rain and snow overnight. Low near 25F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 4C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. E winds shifting to SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 2C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening then fog developing overnight. Low 37F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning rain followed by a mix of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Temps nearly steady in the upper 30s. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the night. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%. 3-7cm of snow and ice expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Some snow showers around in the morning. Then a wintry mix expected in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%. Snow and ice accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low near 30F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers early will give way to a mix of wintry precipitation in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow and ice accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Intermittent freezing drizzle in the morning will evolve to a wintry mix in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%. Snow and ice accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A wintry mix in the morning will transition to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High 36F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.
